name: LELLO 34

basics.builder: Henry Vink Boat Builders Pty Ltd (SA)

notes:
A heavy displacement, ruggedly built, ocean cruising yacht from South Africa. Dimensions shown here are only approximate.
Early version (1975) had the deck around the coach-roof in plywood with fiberglass overlay and the coach-roof itself made out ot wood.
Image and more information has been promised.
Apparently there was an earlier wood version.
Thanks to 'Nerites' for additional information.
